page.title: 03Transport, Aldwark Area.
page.content:
The area is crossed by minor roads running both north-south and east-west. There are no major roads in the area. The area is not served by public transport; but transport is provided for school-children, - up to the age of 11 by taxi to Brassington, grid ref.05430232, a distance of 3.5km.,and from 11, by bus to The Anthony Gell Comprehensive School, Wirksworth, grid ref.05360288, a journey of 11km. Most families have a car.
There is a postal collection in Aldwark at 07.15 hours, daily except Sundays and Bank Holidays. All dwellings have a daily mail delivery.
Most families have a telephone.
